channel.title: Unsigned
channel.description: Every time I try to load a signed java applet, it says: The code cannot be verified by a trusted source. Code will be treated as unsigned. Name: (Insert applet name here) java.ioEOFFEXCEPTION It says this on every single signed applet I try to run. How do I fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2009, 07:17:53 pm[/size][hr]I guess everyone hates me =(

item.title: Unsigned
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

Every time I try to load a signed java applet, it says:
The code cannot be verified by a trusted source.
Code will be treated as unsigned.
Name: (Insert applet name here)
java.ioEOFFEXCEPTION
It says this on every single signed applet I try to run.
How do I fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2009, 07:17:53 pm[/size][hr]I guess everyone hates me =(

Read full topic
